post.body: We didn't book the cattery early enough:-( Actually he's coping pretty well. Been outside and came back - my biggest worry.
Yes, you should. They may be shouting "Eat me. Eat me." but you need to ignore them.
If only you'd had a bodyless bass this time...:-(
There are better iPhone clients that Twitterific. Tweetie has @stephenfry seal of approval, but I'm waiting for @TweetDeck.
In the days when I used to be a bad guitarist I used to wish I'd taken up something more portable. Piccolo, maybe...!
How much baggage allowance do you get these days...?
I couldn't believe how few things I set the recorder for before leaving for a week away. Worst year I can remember...
I can manage with just the iphone, probably. The house has broadband. Just not WiFi. I might just have to fix that...
At least I now have @TweetDeck on my laptop instead of Twitterific on my iPhone. Can't wait for the iPhone version of TweetDeck to turn up!!
Just finished rebuilding my mum's laptop. As well as setting up the wireless router. There's no such thing as a holiday for a techie:-)
It is much faster than the GPRS I had just a few hours ago, but Virgin ADSL is *so slow*. Now I remember why I switched from Virgin to O2...
I have WiFi. Yay!
Turns out my parents have a WiFi router. In a box. I know what I'm doing this evening. Fast internet here I come. Result!
Letting Smudge out in parent's garden for the first time. He'd better not disappear. Especially as it is dark and FREEZING!
No WiFi. Not even a 3G signal here. Or even Edge. Not sure I'll cope for a week:-) Might need to go router shopping...
Cat not at all sure of his temporary new home. He's found a corner to hide in!
Made it. M6 ok. Beautiful sky on the M62 heading into Liverpool...
Smudge has returned! Hurray! Just a few minutes and we'll be M6-bound...
Cat still AWOL. We could be waiting a while for him if he's off in the woods somewhere...
Ready for annual Christmas tour of relatives, except for the cat who is coming with us. First stop Liverpool....
